settings.cta_text: Book a Pick Up with UPS

settings.title: Gifting and Giving Back
settings.body:
We are on a mission to make every part of our business more sustainable. Our wood crates are handmade in Canada, and are designed to be reused. If you donâ€™t have a use for this crate, you can send it back to us to use again instead of sending it to the landfill.

Returns are easy:

1. Put the empty wood crate back in the shipping box.
2. Use the pre-paid return shipping label included with your gift to send the crate back to us.
3. Drop it at your local UPS or book a pickup using the tracking number on the return shipping label.
